data.name: Realm First! Grand Crusader
data.descr: Participated in the realm first conquest of the Trial of the Grand Crusader with 50 attempts remaining in 25-player mode.
data.tooltip:
Realm First! Grand Crusader

Participated in the realm first conquest of the Trial of the Grand Crusader with 50 attempts remaining in 25-player mode.

Criteria:
- Complete the Trial of the Grand Crusader
